questions_and_notes: These should be weighted by the mass of soil in the pool so that grid cell and time samples with little of a given soilpool contribute little to the mean.
specific_issues: 8:Deprecate? Only 2 groups contributed this variable in CMIP6.
cell_methods: area: mean where land time: mean
long_name: Turnover Rate of Each Model Soil Carbon Pool
comment: defined as 1/(turnover time) for each soil pool. Use the same pools reported under cSoilPools
